testcase.brief: Execute "_test in wifi0/wifi1 cont-tx tx-chain-mask XXXX" to check if AP start transmit as pointed power
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition:
Chain mask: 1/3/7 Radio profile ng phymode 11ng Radio profile na phymode 11na In wifi0 radio profile ng In wifi1 radio profile na
Test Procedure:
1) th wifi0/wifi1 with power 10 "in wifi0/wifi1 radio power 10" 2) Set continuously transmit to check if get power ""_test in wifi0/wifi1 cont-tx tx-chain-mask XXXX" 3) Sniffer capture to check if AP transmit with specified chain mask

step.desc: Chain mask: 1/3/7 Radio profile ng phymode 11ng Radio profile na phymode 11na In wifi0 radio profile ng In wifi1 radio profile na
1) th wifi0/wifi1 with power 10 "in wifi0/wifi1 radio power 10"
2) Set continuously transmit to check if get power ""_test in wifi0/wifi1 cont-tx tx-chain-mask XXXX"
3) Sniffer capture to check if AP transmit with specified chain mask
